items.title: Air India show-caused 9 times in past 6 months over safety violations
items.summary: Air India has received nine safety violation notices in the past six months, highlighting potential concerns for passenger safety. The government is working to address staffing shortages in important aviation organizations like DGCA, BCAS, and AAI.

items.title: I resisted AI for too long. Now it’s game on: Tesla CEO Elon Musk
items.summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk acknowledges the importance of AI, stating that he resisted it for too long and now sees it as a challenge. This comment was made in response to Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang calling Musk a 'superhuman' after his company built a fast AI-training supercomputer named 'Colossus'.

items.title: Why business loan brokers are saying yes to less!

items.title: Worried about ‘burnout’ from non-clinical tasks, clinicians open to AI adoption, finds a report commissioned by Philips
